I have the following 1895 N300 Cap Anson available.

It is in GREAT condition with a horizontal crease running through it and what looks like it might be a small black touch up on the back.

I bought it last year from a board member and have changed collecting focus.

Price is $1750 (less than what i paid!) or would trade for Old Judges
